attributes.action: stop wasting money on art and start putting it back into where it is needed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it is disgraceful that the government find it acceptable to spend several million pounds on putting rocks or fountains at the entrances to public buildings when they are constantly complaining that they have no funding.
So if you also feel that the government should be spending more money on the things that matter like education and health, instead of looking pretty, please sign this petition.
